title: Assault Spy
body:
Assault Spy


Genres/Tags: Action, Beat ’em up (Brawler), Third-person, 3D
Companies: Wazen, NIS America
Languages: ENG/JAP
Original Size: 3.5 GB
Repack Size: 2.1 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Assault.Spy-DARKSiDERS ISO release: ds-assaultspy.iso (3,735,666,688 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 3.5 to 2.1 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-7 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 4 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Check readme.exe in “Save Fix” folder to see how to fix camera bug in game by using fixed save (thanks to sinsisme!)
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The self-proclaimed elite corporate spy Asaru and his deadweight partner Kanoko are hired for a new job in a dreary world dominated by corporations. Their mission? Infiltrate the mega corporation, Negabot. Dash, evade, and smash your way to the truth in this fast paced action game. No secret is safe from THIS bombastic spy duo!
